### Problem 1 
```{r problem_1}
water_wheel = 
  read_excel("./data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx", sheet = 1, skip = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(-x15, -x16, -x17) %>%
  drop_na(dumpster) %>%
  mutate(sports_balls = as.integer(round(sports_balls)))
```
